comments:
Eclipse Version: 3.1.0 Build id: I20050527-1300
CDT 3.0M6

I have a newly created Standard Make C Project, with nothing in it yet.

I right-click on the project in my C/C++ Projects view and choose properties.

The properties window pops up and it's showing me the Info tab.

From here, I can choose to look at any other tab except C/C++ Indexer. If I
select C/C++ Indexer, I get a dialog box with the message: "The currently
displayed page contains invalid values."

Here is the last traceback in the error log:

You need to run CDT M7 with Eclipse M7  (or M6 with M6, etc.)

An alternative approach would be for the code to realize that there is a
mismatch and warn the user.
We do not write upgrade code for intra-release milestones.
